attributes.additional_details: WE WOULD LIKE TO PETITION THE GOVERNMENT.TO TAKE ACTION ABOUT THE RISING NUMBER OF THESE ONE PUNCH KILLINGS OR THE ONE PUNCH ASSAULT THAT CAN SERIOUSLY EFFECT A VICTIM WHO IS ATTACKED. WE WANT TO SEE A CONCERTED EFFORT BY THE GOVERNMENT AND ALSO POLICE FORCES NATION WIDE TO BRING THE AWARENESS OF THIS TYPE OF ASSAULT TO THE ATTENTION OF EVERYONE. LONGER PRISON SENTENCES WOULD BE A START TO TRY AND DETTER THIS KIND OF VICIOUS ASSAULT.
